tasks.task: Potting individual basil plants from a supermarket purchase.
subtasks: Carefully remove the basil plant from the original pot.
Gently separate the roots to avoid damaging the plants.
Plant each stem into individual pots to repot.
Expect the number of new plants to significantly increase, from one to twelve.

tasks.task: Potting individual basil plants from a supermarket purchase. That seems like a task related to gardening or farming, right? So the main thing here is repotting the basil. Let's break it down.

MAINTASK is Potting individual basil plants from a supermarket purchase. Subtasks are carefully removing from original pot, gently separating roots to avoid damage, repotting each stem, and expecting the significant increase to 12 plants.
Potting individual basil plants from a supermarket purchase.
subtasks: Carefully take the plants out of the pot.
Gently tease apart the roots so you don't damage the plants.
Plant each stem into individual pots to repot.
Expect the number of new plants to significantly increase, from one to twelve.
